name: Goop Crossing
description:
Your task is to make your way to the exit market. The levels are randomly generated. Your player is only able to traverse across goop matching their current color. You can create more or turn existing goop into a compatible color using your tools. You have limited amounts of these. Their quantities are shown along the to bar. There are power-ups on the map to replenish your supplies. The map will grow larger as you progress.

Goop Crossing is a roughed out idea for GeoJam 2022.
